scripts.forkApkParse: git remote add apkParse https://github.com/NgeKaworu/app-info-parser; git subtree add -P src/utils/apkParse apkParse master
scripts.pullApkParse: git subtree pull -P src/utils/apkParse apkParse master --squash
scripts.pushApkParse: git subtree push -P src/utils/apkParse apkParse master
scripts.forkEDK: git remote add EDK http://git.yingzhongshare.com/fuRan/EDK.git; git subtree add -P src/EDK EDK master --squash
scripts.pushEDK: git subtree push -P src/EDK EDK master
scripts.pullEDK: git subtree pull -P src/EDK EDK master --squash
scripts.forkEnumUtil: git remote add enumUtil https://github.com/NgeKaworu/ts-enum-util.git; git subtree add -P src/enumUtil enumUtil master --squash
scripts.pushEnumUtil: git subtree push -P src/utils/enumUtil enumUtil master
scripts.pullEnumUtil: git subtree pull -P src/utils/enumUtil enumUtil master --squash
